pageProduct.name: Swisse Daily Face Moisturiser For Men 120ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Daily Face Moisturiser For Men is a nourishing, non-greasy lotion created with Glycerin, Cocoa Seed Butter and Niacinamide to hydrate the skin and replenish the skin's moisture barrier. The fast absorbing lotion instantly soothes dry or post-shave skin.

Warnings

This product contains essential oils. Test prior to use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction, consult your medical practitioner. Store below 28°C

Common Uses

Nutrient-rich face lotion for ultimate hydration

Ingredients

Water (Aqua) Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil Glycerin (Plant Derived) Glyceryl Stearate SE Cetearyl Alcohol Niacinamide Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil Acanthopanax Senticosus (Eleuthero) Root Extract Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil Pogostemon Cablin Leaf Oil Vetiveria Zizanoides Root Oil Cedrus Atlantica Bark Oil Juniperus Virginiana Wood Oil Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil Abies Sibirica (Siberian Fir) Oil Mentha Spicata Herb Oil Carrageenan Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate Citric Acid Benzyl Alcohol Dehydroacetic Acid

Directions

Blend a small amount between palms and massage into skin in a circular motion. Recommended for use twice daily, in the morning and evening.
